Articles.Content:
What do you have achieved on your bucket list? Easy as that.

My (nearly nonexistent) bucket list:

1) Live to see a country founded. (Yep.)

2) Live to see the system of hierarchy to the Crown in the UK change. (Yep.

)

Nothing else...

1) Blow up a house

2) drive like a maniac from a Michael bay film.

3) live to see a manned landing on mars

1) Blow up a house

2) drive like a maniac from a Michael bay film.

3) live to see a manned landing on mars

Good luck on that one.

Good luck on that one.

That's just for starters

1) drive a steam powered car like a boss around town ,and throwing apples at the sidewalk in a formal manner.

2)do everything in the 100 ways to get kicked from walmart thread

3)live to see the first power supply that some one can physically eat with out ,and death occurring so i can create an electric muffin

4)make several thousand muffins ,and open a bakery that will give them all out free of charge.

5)Fly an airplane then attempt to land it on top of another airborne air craft bigger than the plane i would be flying.

5)Fly an airplane then attempt to land it on top of another airborne air craft bigger than the plane i would be flying.

This gave me a great idea

This gave me a great idea

your welcome

1: Make a bucket list.

2: Add something to that bucket list.

Not sure about mine, but it would involve :-

Belt fed full-auto machine guns

A Harley Davidson XR-750 flat track race bike

A Lockheed F-104 Starfighter or an English Electric Lightning

Seeing Jimi Hendrix play live ( may require invention and use of time machine )

Sending every politician and bureaucrat on the planet to low Jool orbit, then going " Whoops, we don't have the Dv to get you back home, but we'll send a rescue mission ASAP, enjoy the radiation in the meantime "

Watching 'Happy' become the President of the Sons Of Anarchy MC

'Hunting' an Iberian Lynx with a video camera

Build a liquid fuelled rocket motor of 'flight weight' and then maybe strap it to a go-kart

Live in a remote rural area where you don't even have a street address and the government can't find you to boss you around and make your life a misery*

*Got that one covered already

1. get a bigger bucket

that is all
Play the complete final "boxed" version of KSP

1. Move to Ohio

2. Visit the Neil Armstrong Air and Space Museum

3. See the new World Trade Center in NYC

4. Meet Buzz Aldrin

5. Visit the U.S. National Air and Space Museum

6. Visit Houston Control Center

7. See a Rocket Launch (Manned or unmanned)

8. Visit Kennedy Space Center

9. Live to see Gas Prices go under $1.00 a Gallon

10. Meet a former US President

11. Get a small SRB, bolt it to the rear-end of a politician's Automobile, and light it.

12. Meet an astronaut

Edited July 18, 2013 by Flymetothemun

1. Make films.

2. Earn enough money to get by and support my projects.

3. Fall in love and get married/partner

4. Live to see a manned Mars mission or other interplanetary mission.

Most people seem to be doing all space things, but really my interest in space is only one aspect of me.
